ABOUT_US_HEAD.title: ABOUT US
ABOUT_US_HEAD.slogan: Specialized in crafting innovative solutions that redefine possibilities.

ABOUT_US_SLOGAN: We craft and refine client-driven concepts to seamlessly integrate with our precisely designed applications ensuring optimal functionality and user satisfaction at every step.
We design solutions that surpass expectations and propel our clients toward success.

With our expertise, we develop, and design applications tailored to the client's requirements. Our expertise allows us to customize and modify the applications we design to align perfectly with the client's company and business visions.

ABOUT_US_MAIN_SLICES.title: Core Value

WHAT_WE_DO_SLICES.title: Cutting-Edge Software
WHAT_WE_DO_SLICES.description: We specialize in developing applications that meet the needs of our clients with precision and creativity, utilizing the latest tech and frameworks.

WHAT_WE_DO_SLICES.title: Technology Advancement
WHAT_WE_DO_SLICES.description: Embracing innovation in artificial intelligence, virtual reality, and big data analytics to drive our clients, businesses forward with creativity and expertise.

WHAT_WE_DO_SLICES.title: Creative Innovation
WHAT_WE_DO_SLICES.description: From CladCut to ChatPlus, our projects showcase our commitment to pushing boundaries and creating groundbreaking solutions that make a difference.

WHAT_WE_DO_SLICES.title: Specialized Solutions
WHAT_WE_DO_SLICES.description: Crafting custom applications to fulfill unique requirements and objectives, ensuring our clients, success and business growth.

WHAT_WE_DO_SLICES.title: Client-Centric Approach
WHAT_WE_DO_SLICES.description: Putting our clients at the heart of everything we do, we strive to exceed expectations and deliver exceptional results that propel their success.

WHY_US_HEAD.title: WHY US
WHY_US_HEAD.slogan: We Build Relationships, Not Just Projects.

SERVICES.title: Software Development
SERVICES.slogan: Our software development services focus on delivering tailor-made solutions that align with your business goals. Whether it's developing innovative applications or upgrading your existing systems, we ensure robust, reliable, and seamless software experiences.

SERVICES.title: Software Customization
SERVICES.slogan: We offer software customization services to align existing systems with your unique business requirements. From modifying off-the-shelf solutions to enhancing current functionalities, our team ensures tailored, efficient, and seamless software performance.

SERVICES.title: Web Development
SERVICES.slogan: Our web development team combines creativity and technical expertise to create websites that captivate your audience and drive results. From simple websites to advanced web platforms, we deliver solutions tailored to your vision.

SERVICES.title: Mobile App development
SERVICES.slogan: Transform your business with our mobile app development services. We design and build intuitive, high-performance apps for iOS, Android, and cross-platform solutions, delivering exceptional user experiences and innovative features.

SERVICES.title: UI/UX Desgin
SERVICES.slogan: Our UI/UX design team specializes in building interfaces that leave a lasting impression. We align design aesthetics with user needs, creating experiences that are both beautiful and practical.

SERVICES.title: Facade Fabrication
SERVICES.slogan: Our expertise in facade fabrication integrates advanced computational tools like Grasshopper to deliver custom cladding solutions. We provide 3D manufacturing models and detailed fabrication drawings, ensuring efficient and high-quality results.

OUR_PRODUCTS_SLOGAN: Each developed with precision, passion, and a deep commitment to excellence.

GRASSHOPPER_PAGE_BANNAR_SLOGAN: Precision engineering for exquisite facade fabrication.

GRASSHOPPER_PAGE_BANNAR_SLICE.title: The Ultimate Tool for Creativity and Efficiency
GRASSHOPPER_PAGE_BANNAR_SLICE.slogan: Grasshopper is the ultimate tool for architects, engineers, and designers seeking to push the boundaries of creativity and efficiency.

GRASSHOPPER_PAGE_BANNAR_SLICE.title: Empowering Designers and Engineers
GRASSHOPPER_PAGE_BANNAR_SLICE.slogan: Grasshopper empowers designers and engineers to push the boundaries of traditional modelling through a flexible, intuitive, and powerful dynamic design environment.

GRASSHOPPER_PAGE_BANNAR_SLICE.title: Significant Time Savings
GRASSHOPPER_PAGE_BANNAR_SLICE.slogan: Grasshopper can save approximately 40-80% of the time typically required for complex design and modelling tasks by automating repetitive processes, enabling rapid iterations, and integrating analysis tools, this estimate assumes that users have a moderate to high level of proficiency with Grasshopper, as familiarity with the tool greatly enhances its efficiency benefits.

GRASSHOPPER_PAGE_QUICK_START.title: About Grasshopper
GRASSHOPPER_PAGE_QUICK_START.slogan: Grasshopper is a powerful visual programming language and environment integrated within the Rhino Modules modelling software. It allows users to create and manipulate complex designs that offers significant time savings and enhanced design capabilities.

GRASSHOPPER_PAGE_SERVICES_HEAD.title: Our Services
GRASSHOPPER_PAGE_SERVICES_HEAD.slogan: Delivering premium services for an outstanding experience

GRASSHOPPER_PAGE_SERVICES_SLICE.title: Fabrication-Ready Data
GRASSHOPPER_PAGE_SERVICES_SLICE.slogan: We provide accurate and detailed fabrication-ready data for CNC machining, laser cutting, and other digital fabrication methods, ensuring a smooth transition from digital model to physical component.

GRASSHOPPER_PAGE_SERVICES_SLICE.title: Quality Assurance
GRASSHOPPER_PAGE_SERVICES_SLICE.slogan: Our precise digital models minimize errors and reduce waste, ensuring that every component is fabricated to the highest standards of quality.

GRASSHOPPER_PAGE_SERVICES_SLICE.title: Precision & Control
GRASSHOPPER_PAGE_SERVICES_SLICE.slogan: The ability to define precise relationships and dependencies between design elements ensures greater control over the final output, improving accuracy and quality.

GRASSHOPPER_PAGE_SERVICES_SLICE.title: Expert Consultation & Support
GRASSHOPPER_PAGE_SERVICES_SLICE.slogan: Our team of engineers offers expert consultation throughout the project, from initials to final installation.

GRASSHOPPER_PAGE_HEADS.title: Learning and Development
GRASSHOPPER_PAGE_HEADS.slogan: The visual programming approach makes it accessible to those without extensive coding knowledge, while still offering advanced capabilities for those who wish to dive deeper into scripting and algorithmic design.

GRASSHOPPER_PAGE_HEADS.title: Collaborative Potential
GRASSHOPPER_PAGE_HEADS.slogan: Grasshopper's ability to integrate with other software and file formats enhances collaboration across different teams and disciplines, fostering better communication and workflow integration.

head.title: Why Choose Us?
head.slogan: At DomApp, we have specialists in cutting-edge facade fabrication that combines the power of Grasshopper with our team of experienced engineers. Our advanced parametric design capabilities enable us to create stunning, efficient, and highly customizable facade solutions.

slice.title: Innovative Solutions:
slice.slogan: We are at the forefront of facade design and fabrication, offering innovative solutions that set your building apart.

slice.title: Client-Centric Approach:
slice.slogan: Your satisfaction is our priority. We work closely with you to understand your needs and exceed your expectations.

slice.title: Experienced Team:
slice.slogan: Our team combines technical expertise with creative vision, delivering exceptional results every time.

first.title: Immediate Visualization:
first.slogan: Preview designs in real-time with custom display settings, facilitating faster evaluations and presentations.

seconed.title: Clear Documentation:
seconed.slogan: Annotate and document design logic directly within the Grasshopper canvas, making it easier to understand and communicate complex designs.

first.title: Dynamic Modifications:
first.slogan: Quickly explore different design options by adjusting sliders or parameters, enabling rapid prototyping and iteration.

seconed.title: Immediate Feedback:
seconed.slogan: Visual updates in real-time help identify design issues and improvements instantly, speeding up the decision-making process.

first.title: Advanced Computational Power:
first.slogan: Perform complex geometric calculations and manipulations that would be time-consuming and error-prone if done manually.

seconed.title: Automated Analysis:
seconed.slogan: Integrate analysis tools (like structural or environmental analysis) directly within the design process, providing immediate insights without needing separate software.

RDAPP_PAGE_QUICK_START.title: Quick Start
RDAPP_PAGE_QUICK_START.slogan: Discover a seamless experience with RDAPP.

RDAPP_PAGE_NOTE_1: “Choosing RDAPP Means Benefiting From The Best Of Smart Solutions That Save Time And Cost And Enhance Efficiency And Communication Efforts, It Is A Great Competitive Advantage, In Line With Saudi Building Code.”

RDAPP_PAGE_HEAD_1.title: Exclusive Features
RDAPP_PAGE_HEAD_1.slogan: RDAPP stacked with the best features.

RDAPP_PAGE_HEAD_3.title: Exclusive Features
RDAPP_PAGE_HEAD_3.slogan: RDAPP Provides Best Communication And Cost Monitoring

RDAPP_PAGE_CARDS_1.title: Increased Productivity
RDAPP_PAGE_CARDS_1.slogan: Efficient platform for managing risks, It streamlines the entire risk management process, eliminating manual and time-consuming tasks allowing teams to manage risks more effectively and efficiently.

RDAPP_PAGE_CARDS_1.title: Secure Data
RDAPP_PAGE_CARDS_1.slogan: Advanced encryption protocols to safeguard data, ensuring secure transmission and storage.

RDAPP_PAGE_CARDS_1.title: Saudi Code Compliance
RDAPP_PAGE_CARDS_1.slogan: Every risk management strategy and precautionary measure implemented is aligned with the regulations outlined in the Saudi Building Code, prioritizing safety and regulatory adherence throughout.

RDAPP_PAGE_INFO_1.title: RDAPP PURPOSE
RDAPP_PAGE_INFO_1.slogan: The RDAPP is designed with the main purpose of assuring that each project is complying with the Saudi Building Code and receives the technical attention needed for high-quality output. Tracking the stages of progress for each project and ensuring seamless coordination with the various parties involved, starting from receiving the project, followed by the initial risk assessment and any deeper review by the experts in several fields of civil engineering, such as geotechnical studies, structural analysis, innovative materials..etc. and going through each technical inspection stage on-site with efficiency.

RDAPP_PAGE_INFO_2.title: USER FRIENDLY
RDAPP_PAGE_INFO_2.slogan: The RDAPP boasts a user-friendly interface, ensuring smooth navigation and effortless interactions for all users. By displaying all the reports issued for the project, all the tickets for the project, and clarifying the project status. The RDAPP’s straightforward layout and clearly labeled options make it a breeze for users to accomplish tasks and access information.

RDAPP_PAGE_INFO_2.title: INTEGRATION
RDAPP_PAGE_INFO_2.slogan: Integrating all technical reports and relevant documents into one application that is designed with specific limits according to the Saudi Building Code, with easy access for all users to create, edit, and share documents according to their specific roles. The RDAPP streamlines the issuance of RD and inspection reports for technical engineers, automatically populating data across all reports and eliminating redundant data entry.

RDAPP_PAGE_HEAD_2.title: DATABASE PROTECTION
RDAPP_PAGE_HEAD_2.slogan: Data protected by CITC Decision Number 424/1442 Date 27-01-1442.

RDAPP_PAGE_INFO_3.title: PROCESS CONTROL
RDAPP_PAGE_INFO_3.slogan: The documentary cycle of each report is transferred from one specialist engineer to another, with more than different possible paths for each project that provide full technical disciplines that can guarantee automatically higher quality for each report issued.

RDAPP_PAGE_INFO_3.title: PRODUCTIVITY
RDAPP_PAGE_INFO_3.slogan: Based on our customers feedback RDAPP will increase the productivity of each report issued 50% reduction in time, organizing each report cycle, and connecting all parties involved faster. The RDAPP will provide an Instant Unified Report Update with each step within the paths designed making both the design review and the site inspection visits according to the Saudi Building Code, and much more efficient.

RDAPP_PAGE_INFO_4.title: COMMUNICATION
RDAPP_PAGE_INFO_4.slogan: An e-mail is sent automatically from the application without human intervention, as once the any report is approved by the technical department manager, all technical reservations in the report will be sent to Stakeholders, the client and the contractor.

RDAPP_PAGE_INFO_4.title: COST MONITORING
RDAPP_PAGE_INFO_4.slogan: We have effectively developed a cost-per-meter technique that provides an estimated project value for each element in the Bill of Quantities (BOQ). This method has been programmed into the RDAPP with detailed factors to enhance cost evaluations for projects and promptly notify Stakeholders of any flagged concerns.

RDAPP_PAGE_CARDS_2.title: Real-Time Collaboration
RDAPP_PAGE_CARDS_2.slogan: Enable seamless collaboration among team members with real-time document editing and sharing capabilities.

RDAPP_PAGE_CARDS_2.title: Mobile Accessibility
RDAPP_PAGE_CARDS_2.slogan: Access project information anytime, anywhere with mobile accessibility.

RDAPP_PAGE_CARDS_2.title: Audit Trail
RDAPP_PAGE_CARDS_2.slogan: Maintain accountability and transparency with an audit trail of document revisions and user actions.

RDAPP_PAGE_CARDS_2.title: Data Security
RDAPP_PAGE_CARDS_2.slogan: Protect sensitive project data with robust security measures.

RDAPP_PAGE_CARDS_2.title: Integration
RDAPP_PAGE_CARDS_2.slogan: RDAPP offers Integration with existing systems ensuring smooth data flow.

RDAPP_PAGE_CARDS_2.title: Rsponsive Support
RDAPP_PAGE_CARDS_2.slogan: RDAPP offers Integration with existing systems ensuring smooth data flow.

RDAPP_PAGE_CARDS_3.title: QUALITY CONTROL
RDAPP_PAGE_CARDS_3.slogan_1: One of the key standout capabilities of the RDAPP is its capacity to enhance process excellence it achieves this automatically by highlighting the technical reservations according to the Saudi Building Code in each project to Stakeholders.
RDAPP_PAGE_CARDS_3.slogan_2: The client, and the inspection engineer this way the RDAPP reduces the potential human errors factor and streamlines the inspection process for the engineers.
RDAPP_PAGE_CARDS_3.slogan_3: Identifying projects requiring advanced technical engagement and routing them to the respective subject matter experts.

RDAPP_PAGE_CARDS_3.title: DOCUMENTATION
RDAPP_PAGE_CARDS_3.slogan_1: With the built-in documentation system, users can easily create, edit, and share project reports at the same moment, ensuring efficient collaboration among team members. The documentation system offers advanced search and filtering capabilities.
RDAPP_PAGE_CARDS_3.slogan_2: Allowing users to quickly locate specific documents based on project numbers, locations, dates, and engineers who participated in the project, etc.
RDAPP_PAGE_CARDS_3.slogan_3: The application's documentation system includes automated notifications and reminders, ensuring that technical reservations, notes, and all the project updates have been received by the engineers.

BONDIFYCRM_PAGE_QUICK_START.title: Quick Start
BONDIFYCRM_PAGE_QUICK_START.slogan: Don't forget to watch our quick start tutorial.

BONDIFYCRM_PAGE_CARD_1.title: Project Management
BONDIFYCRM_PAGE_CARD_1.slogan: This application offers highly advanced features designed to streamline project management. Enhance your efficiency further by utilizing the project templates and project cloning capabilities, making your workflow even smoother.
slice: Project Overview: Assign team members, supervisors, and project leads.
Project Tracking: Manage and track project progress, including status updates, milestones, and completion targets.
Project Duplication: Easily clone existing projects for efficiency, with full visibility into team activities and time allocation.

BONDIFYCRM_PAGE_CARD_2.title: Task Management
BONDIFYCRM_PAGE_CARD_2.slogan: Ensure task completion on schedule to accomplish your goals. Utilize the application's advanced functionalities like task cloning, timers, reminders, and more to enhance productivity and efficiency. Assign tasks to both team members and clients to streamline collaboration.

BONDIFYCRM_PAGE_CARD_3.title: Time Tracking
BONDIFYCRM_PAGE_CARD_3.slogan: Effortlessly monitor the time invested in your projects using the bondify CRM comprehensive time-tracking solution. Begin or end your timer or input time manually for tasks. Then, seamlessly bill your clients based on the recorded time.
slice: Track time spent on specific tasks or projects.
Track time manually by entering start and end times.
Built-in timer feature to track time automatically.

BONDIFYCRM_PAGE_CARD_4.title: Invoices & Payments
BONDIFYCRM_PAGE_CARD_4.slogan: We’ve developed an incredibly user-friendly invoicing system, removing the necessity for third-party invoicing tools. Within the bondify CRM, you can easily create invoices with diverse options such as time billing, product billing, task billing, and others. Invoices are automatically sent to clients via email, enabling them to conveniently make online payment gateways.

slice.title: Payments
slice: Control product, time, and task billing.

BONDIFYCRM_PAGE_CARD_5.title: Subscriptions
BONDIFYCRM_PAGE_CARD_5.slogan: This functionality allows you to automatically bill your clients for your products and services. You have the flexibility to set the billing cycle to weekly, monthly, yearly, and more. The system will then automatically generate a new invoice and charge your client's accordingly.

BONDIFYCRM_PAGE_CARD_6.title: Estimates/Quotations
BONDIFYCRM_PAGE_CARD_6.slogan: Clients are more inclined to engage in a project when they have an estimate of the total cost involved. The application offers a user-friendly tool for effortlessly creating and emailing estimates to your clients. This enables your clients to conveniently review and accept the estimates provided.

BONDIFYCRM_PAGE_BREAK_2: INTEGRATED BUSINESS MODALES CREATED FOR SPEED & EFFICIENCY

BONDIFYCRM_PAGE_CARD_7.title: Time Tracking
BONDIFYCRM_PAGE_CARD_7.slogan: Effortlessly monitor the time invested in your projects using the bondify CRM comprehensive time-tracking solution. Begin or end your timer or input time manually for tasks. Then, seamlessly bill your clients based on the recorded time.
slice: Track time spent on specific tasks or projects.
Track time manually by entering start and end times.
Built-in timer feature to track time automatically.

BONDIFYCRM_PAGE_CARD_8.title: Recurring Billing
BONDIFYCRM_PAGE_CARD_8.slogan: You have the flexibility to generate recurring invoices on a daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly basis. The system will independently generate new invoices and send them to your clients via email.

BONDIFYCRM_PAGE_CARD_9.title: Leads & Opportunities
BONDIFYCRM_PAGE_CARD_9.slogan: Effectively manage your opportunities and guide leads into paying customers seamlessly Utilize our advanced form builder to effortlessly capture new leads, which can then be embedded on any website.
slice: Convert emails, messages and anything into a lead.

BONDIFYCRM_PAGE_CARD_10.title: Knowledge Base
BONDIFYCRM_PAGE_CARD_10.slogan: Reduce your customer support response time by providing customers access to self-service resources and a help repository. Utilize the knowledge base to create a comprehensive user knowledge base.

BONDIFYCRM_PAGE_CARD_11.title: Leads & Opportunities
BONDIFYCRM_PAGE_CARD_11.slogan: Effectively manage your opportunities and guide leads into paying customers seamlessly Utilize our advanced form builder to effortlessly capture new leads, which can then be embedded on any website.
slice: Convert emails, messages and anything into a lead.

BONDIFYCRM_PAGE_CARD_12.title: Task Dependency Management
BONDIFYCRM_PAGE_CARD_12.slogan: Create task dependencies, establishing relationships between tasks where one task must be completed before another can begin. This sequential dependency management ensures that tasks are executed in the correct order, preventing bottlenecks and ensuring smooth project progression. Dependency management facilitates effective synchronization among your diverse team members.
slice: Notifications and alerts to keep team members informed about changes to task dependencies.
Dynamic task adjustment schedules when dependent tasks are delayed or completed ahead of schedule.

REVIEW.name: Mohamed Ghattas

REVIEW.quote: CladCut is a valuable asset for any business looking to streamline their production process and improve efficiency. CladCut can quickly and efficiently release the most difficult panel.

REVIEW.name: Mohamed Ghattas
REVIEW.title: Operation Manager, Dome FDH
REVIEW.quote: CladCut is a valuable asset for any business looking to streamline their production process and improve efficiency. CladCut can quickly and efficiently release the most difficult panel.
